title: 5 Claims From Trump’s Speech on Iran Deal That Are Misleading or Need Context (Published 2018)
subtitle: President Trump said the pact allowed Iran to enrich uranium and wouldn’t have stopped it from developing a nuclear bomb — claims that lacked context or weren’t entirely accurate.
author: www.nytimes.com
vclaim: 5 Claims From Trump’s Speech on Iran Deal That Are Misleading or Need Context President Trump said the pact allowed Iran to enrich uranium and wouldn’t have stopped it from developing a nuclear bomb — claims that lacked context or weren’t entirely accurate. President Trump on Tuesday at the White House before announcing the United States’ withdrawal from the Iran nuclear deal.
